      Classes and interfaces

      ConfigInterface¶

      Retains and unifies class constructor parameter values with external values.

      « More »

      ContainerInterface¶

      Interface for dependency injection containers.

      « More »

      ForgeInterface¶

      Defines the interface for Forge dependencies.

      « More »

      Config¶

      Retains and unifies class configurations.

      « More »

      Container¶

      Dependency injection container.

      « More »

      Exception¶

      Generic package exception.

      « More »

      ContainerExists¶

      The named DI container already exists.

      « More »

      ContainerLocked¶

      The DI container is locked.

      « More »

      ContainerNotFound¶

      The named DI container was not found.

      « More »

      ServiceInvalid¶

      The service definition is not valid.

      « More »

      ServiceNotFound¶

      The named service was not found.

      « More »

      Forge¶

      Creates objects using reflection and the specified configuration values.

      « More »

      Lazy¶

      Wraps a callable specifically for the purpose of lazy-loading an object.
